item.title: Multiple Talks 2016-01-18
item.description:
Description

Development of an academic cloud infrastructure at IIT Delhi Talk by Asad Siddiqui at PyDelhiConf on 5th Mar 2016. Slides and content available at https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/develepment-of-an-academic-cloud-at-iit-delhi/

Real time web application using Django, Tornado and SockJS details at https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/real-time-web-application-using-django-tornado-and-sockjs/

Panel Discussion about Python in Education Participants from left to right are Sirtaj,Satyakam Goswami,Prof Kannan,Ajit Kumar and Gora Mohanty

Visit https://pydelhi.org/talks for more.
item.dc:creator: Asad Siddiqui
